title: Star Dust Music Cinematic PRO
description: Searching for dreamy starscapes and space-inspiring music? This album might flare up your imagination.
longDescription:
Click here to listen to the album preview


This is the underlying premise of this album: you long for the stars, and your creation longs for it as well. A combination of deep, dreamy pads with synthetic elements, simplified rhythms and discrete orchestral accents, all meant to inspire and fuel the imagination.


12 non-looping tracks, ranging from dream-like to awe-inspiring to darker tones.


Since the nature of the material is focused on themes/melodies, this is excellent for cutscene/cinematic content, menu music, credit rolls, and to some extent in-game background music.


Award-winning composer for video games and films, Lex is a game lover to the core, and his wish is to fuse them with his love for music, therefore if you desire to collaborate or have any inquiries/custom requests, don't hesitate to contact at resonantinfinity@gmail.com, or browse his profile for more awesome music.


A toast to creativity!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  AAA quality, professionally mixed and mastered tracks
  •  Dreamy and awe-inspiring
  •  Sci-Fi material, and fit for Fantasy as well

Number of Audio Wavs: 12

Number of Audio Cues: 12

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 29

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
